attributes.action: review TV licencing with regards to students in Halls of Residence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently, students in Halls of Residence have to pay the full TV Licence fee. In a block of 200 rooms, this seems extortionate. I would like to see a reduced Licence fee for student accomodation.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
